That is a pretty scary situation, I hope everything turned out okay.  Where are you from?

do you know where you're headed now? or are you still in an area where there is no road and therefore you can't leave?

Ah! What are your cats names? I've a Maine coon named Lady Rain.
Do you like having many different breeds of cats?  I had four, but they all died in a house fire.
Oh! What kind of cats were they? I have one little fat cat.  The little cuddlers!

dialog.text: I have a cat, a dog, a snake and a turtle!  I love my pets.

dialog.text: That is so cool! Do they stay in your home? What are their names? .
beam_texts: That is so cool! Do they stay in your home? What are their names? .

Wow! Turtles sound really neat. I love all animals! What else do you like?

Aww, how sweet! I'm glad to have a pet. They're really comforting.

Yes, they stay home all the time.  They're all named Cleo and Merlin!  How about your pets?
The dog stays at home and my snake is called Bear.  He's pretty small!
They stay inside all day.  I like being able to control their activity level.  They are named Kitty Kat.  How about your cats?

I do, a giant molecular ecosystem eater. LOL! We eat meat, but we also cook rice and beans for our pets!

dialog.text: That is amazing!  Huskies are my favorite animal!  What do you feed them?
beam_texts: That is amazing!  Huskies are my favorite animal!  What do you feed them?
I bet they are.  You have a lot to take care of.  It's good you are able to provide for them.
I've always wanted a husky.  They're so soft!  Is yours wild or indoors?
Huskies are beautiful!  They seem so energetic.  Mine love chasing lasers!
I agree, they are lots of work.  Some Huskies are trained as search and rescue dogs, too.
That sounds like a lot.  Can you tell me about their temperament?  Mine are very friendly.
Those are beautiful dogs!  What do they eat?  I've heard that huskys were bred as sled dogs in the Siberian cold.
They are always a lot work.  Have you trained them to pull a sled?  I imagine that it's a lot harder to teach them how to.
Do you groom your huskys?  I know it sounds so tough.  Huskies have a short hair coat.  Is that why you have so many huskie?
Those are cute.  My huskie, Temishell, used to watch over me.  He would play dead.

dialog.text: I have to feed them Fruits and veggies!  It takes a lot out of me!  LOL
beam_texts: I have to feed them Fruits and veggies!  It takes a lot out of me!  LOL
Mostly veggies and protein. They like to make a lot.  What food do you like to eat?
I usually feed them pieces of bread. It is a little cheaper. What do your huskie's eat?
I fed them a good mix of frozen veggies and kale.  They liked it!
Mine are both scared of most things, so I have to really select what to feed them. I do make sure that they have plenty of fresh fruits and veggies, though.
i just let them eat whatever they want. but they like walks. i let them off when they are hungry.
They're mine too! They get lots of frozen tropical chicken, vegetables, nuts and fruits!
I'm pretty health conscious, so I have my own flower garden and try to get the fresh vegetables from the farmer's market.
I feed them Rasparadox and other natural things, but there are some edible treats too!
They have to be fed the "Sims Cat" cat food.  That being said, the food does not have many carbs or sugar.

i get so impulsive that i cant get rid of these clothes and shoes I bought 2 years ago

that is an insecure trait . have you seen anything? i have a bit of an addiction to shopping

dialog.text: This is so true.  It makes me so angry when people just stand there and watch people do everything.
beam_texts: This is so true.  It makes me so angry when people just stand there and watch people do everything.

Don't be.  People do it to be sociable, and be around others.  We all have our flaws.
Don't be!  I know that shopping addicted is totally different from addiction, though.
That's really too bad. People really need to be mindful of others. I can't stand being anxious or scared in public.
I have a hard time staying calm and mostly feel self-confident while shopping.  Do you have a major problem with anxiety?

I don't think anyone can be bluntly called a shopping addict though.  It's something that can be hard to talk about because most people think you just do it because you're on a shopping spree.  What do you think?

you can get over that its normal you'll get over it  lol. its hard tho because you feel like if you didn't get that adrenalin rush how you will react to it
